description: Ms. codex. Title from text 2. On spine: Label reading "Manhaj al-rābiʻ az Ḥabl al-matīn fī al-mawārīth" in Arabic script. Physical description: 11 lines per page; written in small nastaʻliq in black on glazed, laid European paper. Text 9 on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Marginal damp-staining and some repairs. Origin: Text 4, middle of Ṣafar 1110 H [August 1698] (leaf 21a). Text 9, 6 Shaʻbān 1111 H [27 January 1700]. Remaining texts likely completed around the same time.
abstract: Collection of texts on inheritance law, mathematics, and astrology.
contents: 2. leaves 1b-10a: al-Bāb al-thālith min al-manhaj al-rābiʻ min Ḥabl al-matīn fī al-mawārīth / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
7. leaves 50a-89b: Ghunyat al-anām fī maʻrifat al-sāʻah wa-al-ayyām / al-Fayḍ al-Kāshī.
10. leaves 123a-124b: [Notes concerning ḥisāb abjad and other topics].
extent: 124 leaves : paper ; 152 x 104 (104 x 55) mm bound to 152 x 107 mm
